item.description:
Corrected URLS - Sorry!

 

Details here, limit 50 HUG attendees:

http://go.cloudera.com/cloudera_sessions_boston.html/
You *have* to registration here, discount promotion code: HUG

Sorry - corrected URL here:

http://theclouderasessionsboston.eventbrite.com/

Keynote: A Blueprint for Data Management

Dr. Amr Awadallah – CTO and Co-Founder, Coudera

HP Keynote – Build Your Enterprise-ready Foundation for Big Data
Steve Halderman–Director, Americas Shared Solutions Architecture
9:15am
Meet Mission Critical SLAs with Big Data
Joey Echeverria – Principal Solution Architect, Cloudera
9:45am
Optimize Your Data Warehouse for Improved ROI & Data Utilization
Webster Mudge – Sr. Director Technology Solutions, Cloudera
Joey Echeverria – Principal Solution Architect, Cloudera
10:15am
Break, Snacks, Sponsor Networking
10:45am
Delivering Improved Business Value with Big Data
Marty Lurie – Systems Engineer, Cloudera
11:15am
Centralized Systems and Data Management
Webster Mudge – Sr. Director Technology Solutions, Cloudera
11:45am
Fireside Chat with Nokia and Patterns & Predictions
Dr. Amr Awadallah – CTO and Co-Founder, Cloudera
Amy O’Connor – Sr. Director, Analytics, Nokia
Chris Poulin – Principal Partner, Patterns & Predictions
1:30pm
TRACK 1
First Steps:
Get Started with Hadoop
Diana Mears –
Systems Engineer, Cloudera
TRACK 2
Next Steps:
Fostering Hadoop Excellence and Preparing Your Springboard
Marty Lurie –
Systems Engineer, Cloudera
TRACK 3

item.name: The Cloudera Sessions / Getting the most from Hadoop
